taskDescription:
The statement <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{~}(\text{~}p)</annotation></semantics></math> has the same truth value as the statement _______.
